articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Plenty of new faces in South Africa's squads for India series - ICC Cricket
articles.description: South Africa have named their squads for the multi-format home series against India, beginning 10 December.
articles.content: South Africa have named their squads for the multi-format home series against India, beginning 10 December.The tour begins with three T20Is, followed by as many ODIs and finally two Tests, which will… [+4303 chars]
